home.description: I started as a Frontend Developer in the tech field, but now I am gaining experience in project management and business analysis. Looking for new opportunities and projects.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am {{name}} â€” I started as a Frontend Developer in the tech field, but now I work in project management and business analysis. I combine strategy and technology to ensure high-quality and efficient project execution.
about.description2: Technical skills: React, TypeScript, SCSS, and Firebase. Continuous learning and contributing to successful project delivery are my top priorities.

items.description: I will develop professional knowledge in business analytics.
items.longDescription: I will focus on business process modeling, data analysis, and visualization. By the end of the program, I will gain skills in SQL, Excel, and business intelligence tools.

items.description: I gained experience in modern web technologies, component-based approach, and interface design.
I developed fundamental mathematical knowledge during this period.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Fill out the form below to get in touch with me.

areYouSureAllQuestionsFilled: Are you sure that you have answered all the questions in all sections?
questionsAddError: An error occurred while adding questions.

company.q1: What is the legal name of the company?
company.q2: What are the company's main products and services?
company.q3: In which markets does the company operate? (local, international, regional, etc.)
company.q4: How many employees are there, and how many are involved in sales?
company.q5: Who are the company's main competitors?
company.q6: Who are the company's key strategic partners?
company.q7: What are your main customer segments?

website.q1: Does the company have a website?
website.q2: What technology is the website built on?
website.q3: What is the primary purpose of the website? (information, sales, customer support, etc.)
website.q4: Does the website integrate with CRM and other systems?
website.q5: What tools are used for SEO and analytics?

email.q1: Which email systems does the company use?
email.q2: Do you run email marketing campaigns?
email.q3: Do you have automated email notifications?
email.q4: How do you manage customer support emails?

social_media.q1: Which social media platforms does the company use?
social_media.q2: Do you conduct sales or customer service via social media?
social_media.q3: How do you track social media inquiries?
social_media.q4: Do you need social media accounts to be integrated with CRM systems?

sales.q1: Do you have an existing customer database?
sales.q2: How many people are in the sales team?
sales.q3: What does your current sales process look like?
sales.q4: How many stages are in your sales cycle?

customer_service.q1: How do you manage customer inquiries and complaints?
customer_service.q2: Through which channels is customer support provided?
customer_service.q3: How do you measure customer service performance?
customer_service.q4: Do you need automated complaint resolution?

reporting.q1: How do you analyze sales and customer data?
reporting.q3: How do you currently access reports?
reporting.q4: Is real-time data analysis important for you?

automation.q1: Do you need automation for customer inquiries?
automation.q2: Would you like to send automated notifications (email, SMS, etc.)?
automation.q3: Do you require automated workflows in sales processes?

security.q1: Do you have specific requirements for data security and privacy?
security.q2: Who should have access to data and at what level?
security.q3: How should data backup and recovery policies be managed?

budget.q1: What budget have you allocated for Salesforce implementation?
budget.q2: Which features are essential for you, and which can be added later?
budget.q3: What is your timeline for completing the project?
budget.q4: Do you have internal resources for project implementation, or will you rely entirely on external support?

training.q1: What level of training do Salesforce users need?
training.q2: How open are team members to transitioning to a new system?
training.q3: Is interface simplicity and ease of use important for users?
